ingredients.item: ½ small red onion, finely diced
¼ x 28g pack coriander, roughly chopped, plus extra to serve
¼ tsp Tabasco Red Pepper Hot Sauce
400g can black beans, rinsed and drained
100g grated essential Waitrose English Mature Cheddar
¼ jar Cooks’ Ingredients Jalapeño Peppers, drained

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200˚C, gas mark 6. To make a salsa, toss the tomatoes, red onion and the juice of ¼ lime; season and set aside. To make the guacamole, use a fork to roughly mash the avocado with the remaining lime juice and the coriander; season and set aside. Stir the hot sauce through the soured cream; season and set aside.
Arrange the tortilla chips evenly on a large baking tray. Scatter the beans and cheddar over the top and bake for 5-6 minutes, until the cheese has melted.
Scatter the salsa over the tortillas, add spoonfuls of the guacamole and spoon over the soured cream. Sprinkle with the jalapeños and extra coriander; serve immediately.
